_sText: I have updated this map, here is list of changes/fixes/etc. 1. Fixed spawn teleports 2.Added Ceiling lights in spawn 3. Added a monitor of jail above spawn. 4.Changed water texture to cheap to boost fps. 5.Fixed lighting in jail. 6. Added playerclip to those blocks in jail. 7.Fixed the issue when loosing HP in the way to buyzone. 8.Fixed the ladders above the jail. Now they are visible. 9.Added a invisible wall to teleport destinations that will stop players from flying off. 10.Decreased the angle of sloped ledge near jail in the water. 11.Improved the ladders on the platforms to the sides of the map. Also improved the platforms themselves. 12.Nodrawn sides of the sign that says Jail. 13. Added steps to the platforms that are on sides of the map. 14. Redid spawn. 15.Fixed the small brushwork near jail door. 16. Changed the ramps that lead to the side platforms. 17. Added decals to some parts of the map. 18. Changed the curved circle from cylinder to arch for better performance. 19.Redid the triangle with hole in it. 20.Made the super booster obvious Now you just gotta find it. 21. Improved other ramps. new version v2a. Added custom textures with pakrat.
